dcterms:description: The WAY dataset contains approximately 10,000 dialogs curated by human operators, used for dialog-based localization tasks involving a top-down map to determine an agent's precise location.
dcterms:title: WAY

dcterms:description: Matterport3D is a dataset that provides RGB-D data in indoor environments, used for various tasks including navigation and localization.
dcterms:title: Matterport3D

dcterms:creator: Yiyi Liao
Jun Xie
Andreas Geiger
dcterms:description: Kitti360 is a dataset that provides benchmarks for urban scene understanding in both 2D and 3D, focusing on various aspects of urban environments.
dcterms:title: Kitti360

dcterms:creator: Shurjo Banerjee
Jesse Thomason
Jason Corso
dcterms:description: RobotSlang is a benchmark dataset that includes dialogs guiding robot localization and navigation, facilitating the study of dialog-guided tasks.
dcterms:title: RobotSlang

dcterms:creator: Jesse Thomason
Michael Murray
Maya Cakmak
Luke Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: CVDN (Cooperative Vision-and-Dialog Navigation) is a dataset that consists of dialogues where an oracle assists a navigator in completing navigation tasks.
dcterms:title: CVDN (Cooperative Vision-and-Dialog Navigation)
